text: Leon Acton "Lynn" Westmoreland (born April 2, 1950) is an American politician. He was the U.S. Representative for Georgia, serving from 2007 through 2017. He is a member of the Republican Party. He previously represented Georgia's 8th congressional district from 2005 to 2007. ==Other websites== * Congressman Lynn A. Westmoreland official U.S. House site * Lynn Westmoreland for Congress * * * Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Georgia Category:Politicians from Atlanta Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Georgia State University alumni
title: Lynn Westmoreland
